summary: Implements a discrete diffusion scheduler based on KDPM2 with ancestral sampling, offering configurable beta or sigma schedules (linear, scaled, Karras, exponential, beta), handling different prediction types (epsilon, sample, v_prediction), and managing timestep spacing and offsets. Includes utilities to convert schedules, initialize timesteps, add noise, scale model inputs, and execute a single sampling step.
business_intent: Provide a flexible and efficient scheduler for diffusion model inference, enabling fast generation of images or videos by supporting multiple noise schedules and prediction modes within generative AI pipelines.
